New Records: England won by 10 wickets with 24 balls remaining, a significant margin in T20I cricket.
Key Match Events: Alex Hales scored an unbeaten 86 off 47 balls.
Jos Buttler scored an unbeaten 80 off 49 balls.
Chris Jordan took 3 wickets for 43 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: England won the toss and elected to field first.
Post-Match Reflections: Alex Hales was named Player of the Match.
England advanced to the final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Adelaide Oval.
The match was officiated by Kumar Dharmasena and Paul Reiffel, with Chris Gaffaney as the TV Umpire.
